```{r}
source("almond_yeild2.R")


# Read in data 
clim_data <- read_table2("clim.txt") %>% 
  clean_names()


set.seed(99999)
p_list <- rnorm(n = 500, mean = .0043, sd = .001)


almond_yield(clim_data)

mapply(almond_yield, climate = clim_data, t.coeff1 = -0.015, t.coeff2 = -0.0046, p.coeff1 = -0.07, p.coeff2 = p_list, intercep = 0.28)
```
